directions: [["Preheat oven to 350 degrees."],["In a large bowl, combine base ingredients. Place mixture in a casserole dish."],["In a saucepan over medium heat, saute topping ingredients lightly and sprinkle the mixture over the top of the casserole."],["Bake covered in preheated oven for 40 minutes."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
